ingredients:
-Mirsalehi Honey: A natural humectant that attracts and retains moisture for stronger, healthier, shinier hair.-Argan Oil: Strengthens, nourishes, hydrates, smooths, and adds healthy shine. -Baobab Extract: Strengthens, nourishes, smooths, improves manageability, imparts shine, and rapidly conditions.Aqua (Water/Eau), Behenamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Lactic Acid, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Mel (Honey/Miel)*, Sodium Benzoate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Honey, Panthenol, Parfum (Fragrance), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata Seed Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Saccharomyces/Magnesium Ferment, Sorbic Acid, Saccharomyces/Iron Ferment, Potassium Sorbate, Saccharomyces/Zinc Ferment, Saccharomyces/Copper Ferment, Saccharomyces/Silicon Ferment, Coumarin**, Hexyl Cinnamal**, Limonene**, Linalool**.
* Honey sourced from the Mirsalehi Bee Garden / Miel des ruches du jardin Mirsalehi.
** Naturally occurring allergens / Allergènes naturels.Clean at Sephora products are formulated without the following banned or restricted ingredients (please see Clean at Sephora landing page for full list of specific restrictions and allowances by category – this is not an exhaustive list):  Acrylates, Aluminum Salts, Animal Musks/Fats/Oils, Benzophenones and related compounds, Butoxyethanol, Butylated hydroxyanisole (BHA), Butylated hydroxytulolene (BHT) under 0.1% , Carbon Black or Black 2, Coal Tar, Ethanolamines, Formaldehyde and Formaldehyde Releasing Agents, Hydroquinone, Lead and Lead Acetate, Mercury + Mercury Compounds (Thimerisol), Methoxyethanol, Methyl Cellosolve, Methylchloroisothiazolinone and Methylisothiazolinone, Mineral Oil, Nanomaterials (restrictions for specific nanomaterials only), Oxybenzone, Parabens, Petrolatum and Parrafin (USP grade only), Phenoxyethanol under 1%, Phthalates, Plastic Microbeads, Polyacrylamide & Acrylamide, Resorcinol, Retinyl Palmitate, Styrene, Sulfates, Talc (no detection of asbestos) , Toluene, Triclosan and Triclocarban, Undisclosed Synthetic Fragrance (under 1% and formulated without Acetaldehyde, Acetone, Acetonitrile, Benzalkonium chloride, BPA, EDTA, Methylene chloride, PTFE, PFOA), 1, 4, Dioxane (ingredients must comply with impurity thresholds), Octinoxate, PFAS compounds, Nitromusks and Polycyclic Musks, Ethoxylated Ingredients (including PEGS or polyethylene glycol must meet contamination limits for 1’4 Dioxane and ethylene oxide), Cyclic Silicones, EDTA and derivatives (allowed if no technical substitute under 0.2%)

-Mirsalehi Honey: A natural humectant that intensely hydrates and nourishes to restore the natural moisture balance for stronger, healthier-looking, and shinier hair.-Ectoine: Repairs to relieve scalp dryness, flakiness, and redness.-Prebiotic Complex: Promotes a balanced scalp microflora while providing long-lasting hydration.Aqua (Water/Eau), Octyldodecanol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ectoine, Mel (Honey/Miel), Propolis Cera (Propolis Wax/Cire De Propolis), Glycerin, Xylitol, Lactitol, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Ribes Nigrum Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis Seed Oil, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Tocopherol, Cardiospermum Halicacabum Flower/Leaf/Vine Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Apium Graveolens Seed Extract, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Fruit Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa Root Extract, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Citric Acid, Caramel, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum (Fragrance), Hexyl Cinnamal, Coumarin, Linalool, Limonene. Acrylates, Aluminum Salts, Animal Musks/Fats/Oils, Benzophenones and related compounds, Butoxyethanol, Butylated hydroxyanisole (BHA), Butylated hydroxytulolene (BHT) under 0.1% , Carbon Black or Black 2, Coal Tar, Ethanolamines, Formaldehyde and Formaldehyde Releasing Agents, Hydroquinone, Lead and Lead Acetate, Mercury + Mercury Compounds (Thimerisol), Methoxyethanol, Methyl Cellosolve, Methylchloroisothiazolinone and Methylisothiazolinone, Mineral Oil, Nanomaterials (restrictions for specific nanomaterials only), Oxybenzone, Parabens, Petrolatum and Parrafin (USP grade only), Phenoxyethanol under 1%, Phthalates, Plastic Microbeads, Polyacrylamide & Acrylamide, Resorcinol, Retinyl Palmitate, Styrene, Sulfates, Talc (no detection of asbestos) , Toluene, Triclosan and Triclocarban, Undisclosed Synthetic Fragrance (under 1% and formulated without Acetaldehyde, Acetone, Acetonitrile, Benzalkonium chloride, BPA, EDTA, Methylene chloride, PTFE, PFOA), 1, 4, Dioxane (ingredients must comply with impurity thresholds), Octinoxate, PFAS compounds, Nitromusks and Polycyclic Musks, Ethoxylated Ingredients (including PEGS or polyethylene glycol must meet contamination limits for 1’4 Dioxane and ethylene oxide), Cyclic Silicones, EDTA and derivatives (allowed if no technical substitute under 0.2%)
